General.Name: Neo-Neon Holdings Limited
General.Description: Neo-Neon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research and development, production, and sale of lighting products in the People's Republic of China, North America, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It offers LED decorative lighting products comprising neon flex, tape light, tape light string, SMD duralight, party light, and SMD dewdrop string series products; and commercial lighting products, such as recessed down, LED down, and LED track light series products. The company also provides LED industrial and professional architectural lighting products. In addition, it offers asset management, investment advisory, and securities trading services. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Neo-Neon Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of Tsinghua Tongfang Co.,Ltd.
